ModuleDescription:
This course provides academic credit of major research projects conducted
by students prior to the Capstone project. The scope and depth of the
research should be at the level of a Capstone project, and thus requires
unusually strong preparation in science. All projects must be approved by
the Director of the Science Division before the course is selected.
Prerequisite:
Unusually strong preparation in science, and prior approval of the Director of
the Science Division.
